message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $1000000. I'm willing to sell it to you at this price because I'm confident that you'll be satisfied with its quality and value. I'm not trying to lowball you, and I'm willing to take a loss on this one to establish a good relationship. I'll throw in a 10-year warranty and a 30-day return policy, just in case. What do you say?
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'd like to wait and see what the next product is before making a decision.

I completely understand your decision last round, and I appreciate your caution. This round's product is indeed a high-quality one, just like the previous one.
